committedGarments: The garments labelled as committed are products that have been produced using sustainable fibres or processes, reducing their environmental impact. Umino’s goal is to support the implementation of practices more committed to the environment.

compliancePrograms: We work with monitoring programmes to ensure compliance with our social, environmental and health and safety standards for our garments. To assess compliance, we have developed a programme of audits and continuous improvement plans.

finalDescription: We work with monitoring programmes to ensure compliance with our social, environmental and health and safety standards for our garments. To assess compliance, we have developed a programme of audits and continuous improvement plans. Made of super-soft cotton, the Organic Cotton Cutaway Tank features a high neck and back, and a slight curve at the shoulders, which makes it extra flattering. If there’s one thing the ’90s got right, it’s the basics.
shippingInfo: For all orders exceeding a value of 100USD shipping is offered for free.
returnsInfo: Returns will be accepted for up to 10 days of Customer’s receipt or tracking number on unworn items. You, as a Customer, are obliged to inform us via email before you return the item.
returnsPolicy2: Returns will be accepted for up to 10 days of Customer’s receipt or tracking number on unworn items. You, as a Customer, are obliged to inform us via email before you return the item, only in the case of:
unexpectedArrival: Item arrived not as expected (ie. damaged packaging).
goodsInspection: The shipper does not allow the goods to be inspected before payment.
returnRequirements: The returned product(s) must be in the original packaging, safety wrapped, undamaged and unworn. This means that the item(s) must be safely packed in a carton box for protection during transport, possibly the same carton used to ship to you as a customer.

unexpectedItem: Item arrived not as expected (ie. damaged packaging).
paymentInspection: The shipper does not allow the goods to be inspected before payment.

signUpForEarly: Sign up for early Sale access plus tailored new arrivals, trends and promotions. To opt out, click unsubscribe in our emails.
approximateConversion: This is an approximate conversion table to help you find your size. Measure around the fullest part, place the tape close under the arms and make sure the tape is flat across the back (Unit: centimeter).
measureChest: Measure at the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape parallel to the floor.
measureWaist: Measure at the smallest part of your waist. This is usually below the rib cage and above the hip bone.
measureSeat: Measure at the fullest part of your seat, keeping the tape parallel to the floor.
